category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_ignore_users
preference.preference_description: Defines a set user IDs that should not be processed by the ldapsync utility. This list normally contains Teamcenter user IDs that are used for administrative purposes and do not have corresponding entries in the LDAP repository. Valid values: Accepts one or more strings.
